extendedInfo.description: Get automatic alert if a family member is in danger. See each member's real-time location on a map. Communicate in urgent/emergency situations. On average a child is reported missing every 40 seconds. Use the power of Artificial Intelligence to turn your Android into a 24/7 personal body guard. Try the latest and greatest in family security:- Patent pending real-time SAFETY SCORE (beta) uses artificial intelligence to constantly learn, monitor and alert you about each family member's safety- All the basics like real-time Map Updates, Location History, Registration, and Low Battery Consumption work seamlessly- Setup GEO-FENCES to see if your child is where they are supposed to be-- FREE FEATURES --* SAFETY SCORE (beta)A patent pending proprietary algorithm that analyzes information from multiple third party security data sources such as crime data and your child's location data to calculate a real time Safety Score. The Safety Score is a predictor of the safety of your child (100 = Really Safe, 1 = Child is potentially in danger).  * FAMILY LOCATOR MAPReliably locate each family member on a map in real time. Our AcuLocate(tm) technology combines multiple location methods including GPS to quickly pinpoint location. It simply works. Fast.* WEB ACCESSAccess family locator map from any web browser by clicking the -LOGIN- tab at familysiren.com ( familysiren.com/login )* CHECKINA virtual thumbs-up to notify your family that you are safe with one click vs. having to make a phone call.* PLACESAdd commonly visited places such as Home and School.-- PREMIUM FEATURES --Free 7 day Premium trial. $1.99/mo or $14.99/yr afterwards PER FAMILY. Free features are always free.* LOCATION HISTORYIntelligently summarized locations history for each child for the past 7 days.* GEO FENCINGSet virtual "fences" and receive alerts if your child is not where they are supposed to be. For example if Jimmy is supposed to be in school 9am to 2pm and decides to wonder off, you will get an alert. *UMS: Urgent Message ServiceLike unlimited SMS on steroids. Send optional Siren along with SMS for time sensitive messages. Cancel your SMS plan.More info at www.familysiren.com-- REQUIREMENTS --Each family member must have an Android device-- SETUP --Visit http://www.familysiren.com/support/user-guide/

reviews.title: Not website
reviews.comment: So far the app seems promising; however, the website isn\'t functioning or up. All of the FAQs,  guides, etc are not accessible. I will adjust my rating once I see a site and support replies. I will not get a paid subscription if these things aren\'t fixed.
reviews.author: Helen Knowlton

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: A very good app, and  a very very safe one.
reviews.author: James White
